description: A React component named ConnectJiraButton that provides a button to initiate the Jira OAuth login flow, redirecting the user to Jira's authorization URL and handling errors during the process.

methods.name: ConnectJiraButton
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a button to start the Jira OAuth authentication process.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Event handler function invoked when the button is clicked; it initiates the OAuth flow by fetching the login URL and redirecting the user.
